comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content:
From the Commonwealth War Graves Commission website:

Name:O'NEILL, AMBROSE A.
Initials:A A
Nationality:Canadian
Rank:Private
Regiment/Service:Newfoundland Regiment
Unit Text:1st Bn.
Age:29
Date of Death:22/04/1917
Service No:2545
Additional information:Son of Paul and Mary O'Neill, of Admiral's Cove, Ferrneuse, Newfoundland.
Casualty Type:Commonwealth War Dead
Grave/Memorial Reference:II. P. 9.
Cemetery:DUISANS BRITISH CEMETERY, ETRUN

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: A family tree on www.ancestry.co.uk shows his full name as Ambrose William O'Neill born 27th Feb 1887 at Fermeuse, Newfoundland, Canada. He was baptised at Holy Apostles' Roman Catholic Church and was the son of Paul O'Neill and Mary O'Keeffe. His mother died in 1903.
